name: akkaserverless-tck-typescript-sdk
description: Akka Serverless TCK implementation for TypeScript SDK

scripts.build: npm run compile-proto && npm run compile-ts && cp -r generated dist
scripts.tck: (cd ../../sdk && npm pack) && npm install ../../sdk/lightbend-akkaserverless-javascript-sdk-0.0.0.tgz && npm run build && node dist/run.js
